item.title: I'm back. Again
item.description:
I’m back. Again.

I stopped blogging at blog.netzsheriff.de back in 2012 due to a lack of time, ideas and a certain uncertainty regarding the leagal situation which applies to blogging and publishing stuff here in germany. Well, I’m still uncertain but now a have more time and I might even have some ideas about what to write about. So without further ado behold my new blog. Again.
